hotspot_1:<div class="overflow-scrollbar"><div class="modal-infor"><div class="modal-infor--main"></div><div class="tab-content show" id="tab1-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/336x345/" class="mb-3img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Intelligent Planning (1)</h2><p class="txt">Artificial Intelligence is everywhere - now you can use it to automate your workshop booking and loading processes. You can greatly reduce the time it takes for customers to book their vehicles in, and save as much as 25% working time to perform the same workshop loading tasks.</p></div></div></div><div class="tab-content" id="tab2-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/300x200/" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Challenge</h2><p class="txt">In many cases workshop planning is still performed with manual and paper-based processes. This slows down operations, wastes time, increases cost and firmly places the responsibility on the service team's shoulders to make critical business decisions, but in reality they are setup to fail. Even the best laid plans can change, and if you can't adapt fast you may deliver poor customer experience and see retention rates drop.</p></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/300x200/" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Solution</h2><p class="txt">Getac Automotive delivers both rugged hardware and seamless software to create a smarter running workshop and optimized aftersales.</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Real-time processing and distribution of technician duties enables you to avoid resource bottlenecks often caused by low-visibility manual planning.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Our intelligent workshop planning turbocharges calculations of complex workflows to meet customer need - with AI constantly self-learning the unique demands of your workshop.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Utilizes Open API architecture and is RPA compliant.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Uses AI to plan workorders and assign tasks automatically, planning in a way that ensures handover time to the customer will be met and takes into account technician certification and capability.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Our software can adapt instantly in case of sickness to reassign jobs, can take online bookings and planning in teams.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Can work as part of multi or single-point dealerships, constantly generating productivity and efficiency data for management teams.</li></ol></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/300x200/" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Benefits</h2><p class="txt">Smarter workshops deliver optimized aftersales, it's why we've combined rugged hardware with seamless planning software in a single platform.</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Easy and intuitive planning dashboard with visual alerts and full automation for total accuracy.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Customers and service reception staff can book work and allocate technicians in a few clicks for total convenience and speed.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> An adaptable Logic Editor ensures your unique workflows and OEM policies are at the forefront of the planning process and not missed.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Ensure courtesy vehicles, special tools or work-bays are available when you need them</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Dashboard and statistical reporting tracks performance and gives you visibility of your whole operation when you need it.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Seamlessly integrated to OEM, dealership and workshop platforms to speed the processes up and receive information in realtime without the inconvenience of logging in and out of multiple systems.</li></ol></div></div></div><div class="tab-content" id="tab3-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><div hotspot_2:<div class="overflow-scrollbar"><div class="modal-infor"><div class="modal-infor--main"></div><div class="tab-content show" id="tab1-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/336x345/" class="mb-3img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">EVHC (1)</h2><p class="txt">Every Industry is digitalizing, from hailing a taxi to accessing healthcare provider information. Automotive is no different, with customer expectation and behavior driving the need for change. Electronic Vehicle Health Checks (EVHC) enable you to provide a paperless and transparent experience for both customers and service reception team - ensuring the handover and walk around inspection process is kept to a minimum for a better customer experience and a heightened opportunity for upselling wear & tear parts.</p></div></div></div><div class="tab-content" id="tab2-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/300x200/" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Challenge</h2><p class="txt">Paper-based walk arounds take a long time to perform. Once the customer has signed, the service advisor will have to key the notes back into the DMS. This creates double the work and allows the Service Advisor to skip OEM or Dealer standard processes, potentially leaving the dealership exposed. On top of the extra work and risk of non-compliance, customers also have a worsened experience as they must spend time waiting as the Advisor refers back to the DMS for information.</p></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/300x200/" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Solution</h2><p class="txt">Getac Automotive gives workshops the ability to perform easy, integrated and paperless EVHCs.</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> 100% Vehicle Inspections – The Getac EVHC platform mandates that all checks are carried out in accordance with OEM standards, delivering customer peace of mind and more revenue opportunities for the dealer.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Quick Intuitive User Interface – Getac's EVHC platform streamlines the whole process, allowing time estimates and accurate handover times to be generated for a quick decisions.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Fits how you work – Our software is operating system agnostic, with a highly configurable and flexible Open API.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> See the full picture – Get a dashboard and management console to interrogate throughput, compliance and efficiency at a site, group, national or global level.</li></ol></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/300x200/" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Benefits</h2><p class="txt">Getac Automotive's combination of seamless software and rugged hardware come together to deliver a number of workshop benefits:</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Move from slow paper processes to a fast, efficient tablet ecosystem.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Control of health check process.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Give your customers more visibility.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Increase parts per repair order and labor hours sold.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Business intelligence shows where improvements can be made.</li></ol></div></div></div><div class="tab-content" id="tab3-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><div class="swiper-container" id="modal-swiper"><div class="swiper-wrapper"><div class="swiper-slide"><div class="video-iframe"><a class="video-iframe-link" href="#" hotspot_3:<div class="overflow-scrollbar"><div class="modal-infor"><div class="modal-infor--main"></div><div class="tab-content show" id="tab1-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/336x345/" class="mb-3img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">EVHC (2)</h2><p class="txt">On average $35 gets added to the average customer retail invoice every time a EVHC is performed on a vehicle. So it's no surprise that vehicle manufacturers and their dealer network will want to perform a multi-point inspection of the vehicle, while the Technician has the vehicle on the ramp and the wheels off. Dialyzing the process ensures no points are missed and customers are kept up to date in realtime. Increasing conversion rates of red and amber identified items by as much as 70%.</p></div></div></div><div class="tab-content" id="tab2-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/300x200/" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Challenge</h2><p class="txt">Once the vehicle is on the ramp, the technician should carry out a thorough multi-point inspection every time. This is traditionally done on a paper check-sheet, with any identified items logged and updated to the DMS. Though doing it on paper means the technician can skip the full inspection and only check the items they wish to. It's a time consuming process, without transparency for the customer as there is no image or video capability.</p></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/300x200/" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Solution</h2><p class="txt">Getac Automotive gives workshops the ability to perform easy, integrated and paperless EVHCs.</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Paperless Workshops – Digitize paper-based checks and allow the technician to capture photos, videos and comments that can be passed on to the customer in a follow up email.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Native Application</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Online / Offline Capabilities</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Roles based</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Embedded Video</li></ol></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/300x200/" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Benefits</h2><p class="txt">Getac Automotive's combination of seamless software and rugged hardware come together to deliver a number of workshop benefits:</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Move from paper to tablet</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> No double-keying</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Builds trust with a transparent digital experience</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Allow you to deliver on your customer duty of care easily</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> More health checks mean more throughput, safer customers and better retention rates</li></ol></div></div></div><div class="tab-content" id="tab3-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><div class="swiper-container" id="modal-swiper"><div hotspot_4:<div class="overflow-scrollbar"><div class="modal-infor"><div class="modal-infor--main"></div><div class="tab-content show" id="tab1-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/336x345/" class="mb-3img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">PC Based Diagnostics</h2><p class="txt">Did you know there are between 60 and 100 Electronic Control Units on a modern vehicle? Each one requires dedicated diagnostics to conduct a thorough check - and they keep updating. Some happen over the air but others must be done in-person by a diagnostic technician.</p></div></div></div><div class="tab-content" id="tab2-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/300x200/" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Challenge</h2><p class="txt">A comprehensive diagnostic check of a vehicle can take between 1-3 hours and if your workshop deals with products from multiple OEM's, you need a solution that can keep up with both the latest updates and the tough, fast-paced workshop environment.</p></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/300x200/" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Solution</h2><p class="txt">Getac Automotive helps you get back time wasted and maximize your technician time with rugged hardware and seamless software.</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Our tablet PC's connect to the vehicle fast via integrated WLAN or Giga-bit Ethernet.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Getac's PC based diagnostics consider all aspects of the diagnostic process and ensures optimal viewing.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Using rugged, mobile technology allows more time to be spent working on the vehicle without being tied to a workbench.</li></ol></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/300x200/" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Benefits</h2><p class="txt">Getac devices are the optimal tool for both dealership workshops and mobile technicians.</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Cable Free Connectivity – Our devices connect directly to the vehicle, VCI and workshop computer systems with dual WLAN and Bluetooth.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Rugged as a Service – Subscription models are available - enabling you to spread the investment and take advantage of a strong ROI.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Global Certification and Support – Our devices are certified for global use, supporting major OEM programs and backed by world class service and support.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Optimal Screen Size – Larger screen sizes allow users to easily view datalogging, technical publications, wiring diagrams and job card information.</li></ol></div></div></div><div class="tab-content" hotspot_5:<div class="overflow-scrollbar"><div class="modal-infor"><div class="modal-infor--main"></div><div class="tab-content show" id="tab1-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/336x345/" class="mb-3img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Digital Technical Publications</h2><p class="txt">With the average vehicle car parc age getting older - in the US it is circa 11.8 years, Germany 9.8 years and Russia 13 years - upkeep of existing vehicles will require higher maintenance investment. This means access to comprehensive repair and maintenance information from the OEM.</p></div></div></div><div class="tab-content" id="tab2-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/300x200/" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Challenge</h2><p class="txt">Right to repair is a hot button topic across a number of industries - including automotive. OEM's are responsible for providing technical parts and service information to its own network, customers and independent repair facilities - either through technical portals and websites for its franchised service points or online subscription services for the independent aftermarket.</p></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/300x200/" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Solution</h2><p class="txt">"Getac Automotive delivers vehicle code details, non-emission related information, re-programming or flashing for all makes and models, directly to the technician's rugged device - improving vehicle servicing and repair efficiency - to create a seamless technician experience.</p></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/300x200/" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Benefits</h2><p class="txt">Getac Automotive is the proven workshop and diagnostic tool of choice for OEM's around the world.</p><p class="txt">With Getac's optimized solution you get devices that can:</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Become the single platform for repair order tasks, time-clocking, technical data and diagnostics.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Connect with WWAN for OEM cloud-based technical platforms when out in the field or experiencing poor WLAN capabilities.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Confidential technical information secured with Getac optional features such as RFID, Device Monitoring and multi- factor authentication.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Stand up to any workshop task with built-rugged construction and seamless software.</li></ol></div></div></div><div class="tab-content" id="tab3-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><div class="swiper-container" id="modal-swiper"><div class="swiper-wrapper"><div class="swiper-slide"><div class="video-iframe"><a class="video-iframe-link" href="#" data-youtube="2cVl8tj-hYo" data-title="New Generation UX10 Rugged Tablet"><img src="./../assets/YT_UX10.png"> </a><span class="note">New Generation UX10 Rugged Tablet</span></div></div><div class="swiper-slide"><div class="video-iframe"><a class="video-iframe-link" href="#" data-youtube="dgAxqFnfmsQ" data-title="Next Generation F110 Fully Rugged Tablet"><img src="./../assets/YT_F110.png"> </a><span class="note">Next Generation F110 Fully Rugged Tablet</span></div></div></div><div class="swiper-pagination"></div></div></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Getac Device</h2><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> UX10</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> F110</li></ol><br><br><h2 class="title">Software</h2><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Getac Device Monitoring System</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Absolute</li></ol><br><h2 class="title">Accessories</h2><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-7"><div class="device-ar"><iframe src="../../ar/?device=F110" frameborder="0" width="100%" height="400"></iframe></div></div><div class="col-md-5 device-ar-main"><h2 class="title">Experience Getac Devices with Augmented Reality</h2><p class="txt">Scan the QR code with your smartphone, place the device in your environment. You are ready to play with it!</p><div class="device-ar-code"><a href="../../ar/?device=F110" target="_blank"><img src="./../../images/qrcode_f110.png" alt="F110"></a></div></div></div></div></div></div>
hotspot_6:<div class="overflow-scrollbar"><div class="modal-infor"><div class="modal-infor--main"></div><div class="tab-content show" id="tab1-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/336x345/" class="mb-3img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Intelligent Planning (2)</h2><p class="txt">By digitalizing your job cards and connecting to other workshop systems, such as the DMS, parts and technical, you can gain an extra 10% efficiency and save 12 hours per month for the technician versus paper and manual based workflows.</p></div></div></div><div class="tab-content" id="tab2-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/300x200/" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Challenge</h2><p class="txt">Technicians often waste time locating vehicles from the service parking area and this could take as much as 10 minutes per job card. For an average size of workshop (10 Service bays) over the month, this could add up to 146 hours of non-productive time. As well as this, technicians clocking on and off job cards can cause up to 12 hours per month to be wasted accessing centrally located clocking systems.</p></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/300x200/" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Solution</h2><p class="txt">Getac Automotive delivers both rugged hardware and seamless software to create a smarter running workshop and optimized aftersales.</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Paperless – Digitize paper-based workflows with digital repair orders that have task allocation, time-clocking, internal messenger and direct link to parts and technical information (just in time and real time).</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> With the use of proximity technology and the technicians Getac tablet, the technician will be able to quickly locate the vehicle in a busy forecourt.</li></ol></div></div><div class="row mb-5 mb-sm-5 mb-md-3"><div class="col-md-5"><img src="https://fakeimg.pl/300x200/" class="mb-3 img-fluid"></div><div class="col-md-7"><h2 class="title">Benefits</h2><p class="txt">Smarter workshops deliver optimized aftersales, it's why we've combined rugged hardware with seamless planning software in a single platform.</p><ol class="list"><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Your Getac tablet is a single, mobile platform for repair order tasks, time-clocking, technical data and diagnostics.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Enhance compliance with better visibility of the real-time, paperless process.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Connects to your workshop through an Open API that is operating system agnostic.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Our ‘Just in time’ methodology delivers greater convenience and efficiency.</li><li><i class="fas fa-chevron-right"></i> Mobilize your staff to be productive and take on a greater number of revenue generating jobs with far less idle time.</li></ol></div></div></div><div class="tab-content" id="tab3-content"><div class="row mb-sm-5 mb-md-0"><div class="col-md-5"><div
